Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Lekythos with a piriform body and tall narrow neck with a slightly convex profile. The protruding lip has a triangular cross-section. There is an oblique neck-to-shoulder handle and a ring base. On the body, there are two registers of shallow vertical incisions.
